thread.title: Sex robot red light districts: 'Bot brothel' resorts to open worldwide | Daily Star
thread.title_full: Sex robot red light districts: 'Bot brothel' resorts to open worldwide | Daily Star

author: Lily Waddell
title: Sex robot red light districts: 'Bot brothel' resorts to open worldwide | Daily Star
text:
++ Mindblowing sex robots ++ 
Jet-setters will flock to the bot brothels at sex robot holiday resorts similar to popular health spas. 
It is no surprise Amsterdam, crowned the "city of sin", is predicted to be the first place to offer glamorous cyborg brothels. 
And there is no doubt sex tourist hotspots including Philippines, Thailand and Mexico will follow, will be putting themselves on the robot romping map. 
Tourists will gain a diverse sensual experience at the different destinations as each place may offer particular models of the cyborgs with "lifelike warm skin" . 
DAILYSTARONLINE MAPPED: These are the places where sex robot red light districts could open up 
DAILYSTARONLINE ROBOT RED LIGHT DISTRICTS: Sex tourists will gain a diverse sensual experienc 'Celebrity' cyborgs: Scarily lifelike 'Scarlett Johansson' robot in pics Friday, 2nd December 2016 A robot-obsessed graphic designer has built a scarily lifelike cyborg who is the spitting image of actress Scarlett Johansson. 1 / 8 REUTERS The scarily lifelike robot is the spitting image of Scarlett Johansson. “We will see a visit to a brothel in much the same way we see a visit to a health spa” Michelle Mars 
Sexologist Michelle Mars, from Sydney, who co-authored "Robots, Men and Sex Tourism" with futurologist Ian Yeoman, from New Zealand, has said sex robot brothels – similar to Channel 4's Humans – will be popular because they will offer a "novelty value". 
Speaking exclusively to Daily Star Online, she said: "I think the nature of brothels will change. 
"We will see a visit to a brothel in much the same way we see a visit to a health spa. A massage, a facial, an orgasm." 
Hot androids "with a pulse" are also set to take the sex scenes in Brazil, Costa Rica, Cuba, Columbia, Indonesia and Cambodia by storm. 
MEDIARUM SIMILAR: It's going to be just like going to a popular health spa The most REALISTIC sex dolls you will ever see Saturday, 12th November 2016 Would you take one of these glamorous ladies as a girlfriend? From a blonde posing provocatively to a brunette lying seductively on her bed these bombshells look like every man’s dream partner. However, each one is in fact made from plastic. They are in fact a collection of love dolls worth between £75 and £750. 1 / 18 
The bot brothels will be an escape from the "ordinary and mundane" for fellas across the globe – with the experience set to change the tourists forever. 
Dr Mars also told Daily Star Online: "Sex tourism is all about liminal experience. 
"Transporting us from the ordinary and mundane into a new environment, the unknown, where anything is possible. Afterwards we go back to our usual lives but we are forever changed by the experience. 
"It is possible that markets for particular kinds of experiences or particular 'models' of android will be available at different destinations. 
MEDIARUM ATTRACT: Jet-setters will flock to the bot brothels at sex robot holiday resorts Real Sex Dolls in pictures Tuesday, 18th October 2016 A sex doll (also love doll or blow up doll) is a type of sex toy in the size and shape of a sexual partner for aid in masturbation. We take a look at the most life like dolls available in the world. 1 / 27 A visitor of the erotic fair "Venus" touches an erotic rubber doll in Berlin 
"It is probable that the available experiences rather than the destinations will change.” 
Cyborg developer Matt McMullen – who is pioneering the first sex robot set to hit the market on April 15 – also believes bot brothels will open up across the world. 
He previously told Daily Star Online the androids will open up a whole new world of possibilities. Related articles
